data.author: Oscar Wilde
data.en: The difference between literature and journalism is that journalism is unreadable and literature is not read.

data.author: Oscar Wilde
data.en: No man is rich enough to buy back his past.

data.author: Oscar Wilde
data.en: There are many things that we would throw away if we were not afraid that others might pick them up.
